actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction from gross income for certain social security taxes, railroad retirement taxes, and civil service retirement contributions.

summary.text: Allows an income tax deduction, under the Internal Revenue Code, for social security taxes, railroad retirement taxes, and civil service retirement contributions paid by a taxpayer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction from gross income for certain social security taxes, railroad retirement taxes, and civil service retirement contributions.
